original: Hi everyone. I'm here to talk about high street. So I'm going to talk about high street about my classroom. Something wrong happened when I was reading a book. Somebody touched my arm and I felt like a big hand in my shoulder. After that I went to the bathroom and I called my mom to tell her that I was feeling terrible about that.
limpio: Hello everyone. I want to discuss a recent experience I had in my classroom involving a strange incident. While I was reading a book, someone suddenly touched my arm and it felt like a large hand on my shoulder. Feeling uncomfortable, I excused myself to the bathroom where I called my mom to share how upset I was about the situation.
